sentences.en: Blockbuster and world legend about king Artur - on your telephone.
sentences.cn: 在手机上去演绎亚瑟王的伟大历史传奇.

sentences.en: Hollywood seems to have exported the blockbuster model, too.
sentences.cn: 好莱坞似乎也有出口大片的模式.

sentences.en: If you feel it interested, you may buy or rent from Blockbuster and Hollywood.
sentences.cn: 如果你感兴趣! 可以去买了看,或向Blockbuster和好莱坞租片公司借阅.

sentences.en: Is it good to have a blockbuster? Start about the stock.
sentences.cn: 是不是有重磅利好要出了? 股民开始议论纷纷.

sentences.en: It is the cinema-going public who decide whether a film is a blockbuster or not.
sentences.cn: 一部影片是否算热门大片，还要电影院的常客们说了算。

sentences.en: Scenario 1 : Low - cost digital distribution will make the summer blockbuster free.
sentences.cn: 梗概 一: 低成本的数字发行将使热门产品走向免费.

sentences.en: She was just what Ms Handler wanted for a blockbuster new doll.
sentences.cn: 她正是汉德勒女士梦寐以求的能带来轰动效应的一款新玩偶.

sentences.en: So, case closed: for consumers, it's on to the next Apple blockbuster!
sentences.cn: 于是, 事情划上了句号: 对消费者来说, 接下的来就是等待下一款苹果新品!

sentences.en: That new movie is a blockbuster.

sentences.cn: 这次竞选运动声势浩大.

sentences.en: The new James Bond picture is a real blockbuster.
sentences.cn: 詹姆士庞德的新片真的是部轰动巨作.

sentences.en: The new James Bond picture is going to be a real blockbuster.
sentences.cn: 这部新出品的詹姆士庞德影片将会是一部卖座钜片.

sentences.en: There is no point reviewing a blockbuster as you might review a serious novel.
sentences.cn: 为一部大片写影评时，没必要像为一部严肃小说写书评那样认真谨慎。

sentences.en: This sit - com is a spin - off of a blockbuster movie.
sentences.cn: 这部情景喜剧是一部很轰动的电影所衍生出来的节目.

sentences.en: This story is sequel to the 1996 box ? office blockbuster, " 101 Dalmatians. "
sentences.cn: 该片是1996年票房巨片《101只花斑狗 》 的续集.

words.tran_cn: 轰动；巨型炸弹；一鸣惊人者

trans.tran_cn: 重磅炸弹，了不起的人或事，大片，风靡一时的事物
trans.tran_en: a book or film that is very good or successful
